As I delve deeper, I consider how these elements contribute to the overall cinematic experience and how specific techniques in historical costume design or film set construction might be of interest. I need to balance this structured approach with my natural thought patterns, allowing for occasional false starts or reconsiderations. Through this process of applying the expansion technique and exploring related threads, I believe the terms that would be most effective for an augmented query are those that capture the essence of historical fiction filmmaking, production details, and the specific context of "The Man in the Iron Mask".
